laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Illumigene DNA amplification assay for toxigenic C. difficile
laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative for toxigenic C. difficile. Reference Range-Negative.

Mild bibasilar atelectasis, small bilateral pleural effusions, benign small scattered hypodensities in the liver, layering high attenuation material in the gallbladder, a parapelvic cyst on the left kidney, and evidence of prior surgical intervention. No evidence of small-bowel obstruction.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Significant reduction in the extent of inflammatory changes and phlegmon in the right lower abdomen and pelvis since prior imaging.
